text: Harvey Lee Armstrong (born December 29, 1959 in Houston, Texas) is a former professional American football defensive tackle who played eight seasons in the National Football League for the Philadelphia Eagles and Indianapolis Colts. He played college football at Southern Methodist. And had daughter, Sidney Floyd (with Jennifer Floyd). Then, married Sharon Mcarthy, and had second daughter, Madison J. Armstrong. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Houston Category:American football defensive tackles Category:SMU Mustangs football players Category:Philadelphia Eagles players Category:Indianapolis Colts players Category:Chicago Enforcers coaches
title: Harvey Armstrong
